protected_spaces_details.description: Provision for children and young people

description: Amendments to 05/00586/Ful - Erection of 3-5 storey flatted block to accommodate 57 1, 2, 3, & 4 bedroom apartments with associated car parking (40 Spaces), Vehicular access from High Street Plaistow, landscaping and provision of new childrens playground. Crown reduction to existing trees.
